text: Barkingside tube station is a London Underground station on the Central Line. It has been in Travelcard Zone 4 since 2 January 2007. It is on the eastern edge of Barkingside in the London Borough of Redbridge, at the end of a cul- de-sac called Station Road. The station is above ground and has two platforms - northbound and southbound. The station is located at . ==Gallery== File:Barkingside_Station_-_geograph.org.uk_-_87642.jpg|Looking south from Station Road File:Barkingside_stn_north.JPG|Looking north ('eastbound') File:Barkingside_stn_south.JPG|Looking south ('westbound') File:Barkingside_roundel.JPG|Roundel on 'eastbound' platform ==References== ==Other websites== * London Transport Museum Photographic Archive ** ** ** Category:London Travelcard zone 4
title: Barkingside tube station
